w16cs350.datatype

Class CoordinatesWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • w16cs350.datatype.CoordinatesWorld

  • public class CoordinatesWorld
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines coordinates in a world coordinate system of latitude and longitude. Only the Northern and Western Hemispheres are supported. The world is considered to be flat without distortion.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CoordinatesWorld KGEG
      the coordinates of Spokane International; this is not required
      static CoordinatesWorld KSFF
      the coordinates of Felts Field; this is not required
      static CoordinatesWorld KSKA
      the coordinates of Fairchild Air Force Base; this is not required
      static double METERS_PER_NAUTICAL_MILE
      the number of meters in a nautical mile

                                     int latitudeMinutes,
                                     double latitudeSeconds,

                                     int longitudeMinutes,
                                     double longitudeSeconds)
        Builds coordinates based on the primitive arguments instead of the datatypes in the constructor. [§ 4]
        Parameters:
        latitudeDegrees - - the degrees component of the latitude
        latitudeMinutes - - the minutes component of the latitude
        latitudeSeconds - - the seconds component of the latitude
        longitudeDegrees - - the degrees component of the longitude
        longitudeMinutes - - the minutes component of the longitude
        longitudeSeconds - - the seconds component of the longitude
        Returns:
        the coordinates
